input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POLICE COMMUNE. Summary: Providing a Service Consisting in Conducting German Language Classes for Children Aged 4 to 6 Years. Description: Conducting German language classes at Public Kindergarten No. 9 in Police, Tczowa Kraina, ul. Piaskowa 13, 72-010 Police, Police County, West Pomeranian Voivodeship. The service includes teaching German for 4 to 5 hours a week, including at least 1 hour via platforms for interactive meetings and direct interaction at a given facility. During the project, groups of children in each kindergarten will consist of a maximum of 26 people. A maximum of 576 hours of language learning are planned for each kindergarten German.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The subject of the order is the provision of physiotherapy services for children as part of the comprehensive support program for families "For Life". Therapy services will be provided in the form of individual classes with children from birth until they start school.<br> For one hour of therapy a full clock hour (60 minutes) is assumed.<br> 2. The subject of the order was divided into 4 parts according to the expected number of hours (h) of the service:<br> - for part 1 of the procedure, the estimated minimum number of hours is 250 h<br> - for part 2 of the procedure, the estimated minimum number of hours is 500 h<br> - for part 3 of the procedure, the estimated minimum number of hours is 250 h<br> - for part 4 of the procedure, the estimated minimum number of hours is 300 h<br> 3. The allocated number of hours will depend on the number of children actually qualified for the program. For unused parts contract, the Contractor will not be entitled to any claims, except for payment for the service provided.<br> 4. The responsibilities of a specialist conducting individual physiotherapy for children include:<br> - after appointing a team of specialists for a specific child, establishing directions and a schedule activities undertaken in the field of early assistance and family support,<br> - establishing cooperation with the facility where the child is subject to other therapeutic activities in order to ensure coherence of interactions,<br> - developing and implementing an individual project together with the child and his family program.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL SOCIAL WELFARE CENTER IN SIEMIANOWICE ŚLĄSKIE. Summary: Running an Educational and Support Group as Part of the Project "Social Services in Siemianowice Śląskie. Description: 1) The subject of the order is to run an educational and support group for 15 actual caregivers as part of the project entitled Social services in Siemianowice lskie. The aim of the educational support group meetings is to improve the competences of actual caregivers of people requiring support in everyday functioning, residents of Siemianowice lskie, in the care of people who are dependent due to age, disability or health condition. Within the group, participants will have the opportunity to exchange their own experiences and jointly look for solutions to their problems.2) Meetings within the educational support group include a total of 60 clock hours, not less than 40 clock hours. Meetings will be held on average once a month for 2 hours. The group will be open, i.e. you can join it at any time during the project. Therefore, the number of people participating in the group varies. By During the entire duration of the Agreement, 15 actual guardians are expected to participate.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: WARSAW FAMILY HELP CENTER. Summary: Conducting Training for the Warsaw Family Support Center (Wcpr). Description: Regarding Part No. I - Conducting training on Pre-medical first aid in the most typical situations of everyday life, for children, adolescents and adults1) The training will be conducted by 2 (two) instructors with practical experience in emergency medical services. 2) Within training, 4 training groups will be created, up to 15 participants in each group. 3) The training will last 5 hours for each group during one training day, including two breaks of at least 15 minutes, the time of the breaks will be adjusted to the needs of the participants and trainers.4) Training will take place on weekdays from Monday to Friday, at the Ordering Party's headquarters at ul. 11 Listopada 15 B, on the dates indicated by the Ordering Party. A detailed description of the subject of the order for part No. I is included in Annex No. 1.1. down SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-10-28. Closing Date: 2025-11-04. Competition: ICB. Detailed information can be found in Appendix No. 1 to SWZ - Description of the subject of the order.
